text: Douche chill courtesy of Nice Pete

text: who doesn't love the tickle-harvest?

name: phoenixultima
text: Sounds like something Phillipe would come up with.

name: dorothypoopbot
text: what with the Queen Bees and his costume that he was wearing when Nice Pete took him to the ice cream shop

name: tripleg
text: the tickle harvest typically occurs after the kuddlenacht

name: tekende
text:
I just now realized what the tickle harvest probably is. If I'm reading this right, they tickle the "queen bee" until he/she either vomits or shits all of the meth brewing in his/her belly. Is this...does that seem correct? Because if so...

Wow.

name: plummet
text: don't think about it too hard man it only gets worse as you go along

name: norsef
text: I think it's like 2 girls one cup but with no cup and 50 spasmabotic wrong cocks.

name: shutup_shutup
text: This conversation is so horrible it belongs on a beer bottle.

name: carlyle
text: Prison Culture: Something not to be delved into with much gusto

name: cracklewater
text: The concoction has to be puked up, as far as I can tell from the text.

name: djwhiterabbit
text: i like how téodor immediately vanishes upon hearing that nice pete is pissed off.

name: patkun
text:
"What's the matter with nice Pete?"

I love how everyone is used to having a crazed murderer hanging round their houses. He's just one of the guys.

name: farqussus
text:
Who's going to ask him to leave?

Except Blister, but no-one wants Blister mouthing off about how no-one wants Nice Pete around. All murdering people and whatnot.

name: zedpower
text: I gotta scream about all the armies of Judas one of these days. That would stone cold creep out some people.

name: deancain29
text: do it, man, do it.

name: direhaggis
text: Heaven has a fine set of encyclopedias.

name: _cheesekayke
text: I just noticed something. Is Blister meant to look like he's been crucified?

name: honesttom
text: His total lack of facial features reminds me of the Jack Chick depiction of God.

name: relaxing
text: Nah man, all angels look like that. It is a basic fact of Heaven.

name: dasilodavi
text: This sounds like a Wikipedia entry.  Didn't this strip pre-date wikipedia?

name: joeyramoney
text: no.

text: A comment left by geysershitdick was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Jesler729, relaxing, dasilodavi, Crater12)

name: i_love_kate
text: I want this to be true. With the burning desire of a thousand million stars. I want this to be factually-based

name: diggidy
text: I was the same way when I first heard the words "Great Outdoor Fight".  Why, world, do you not bow to the whims of Onstad?

name: hassanoleary
text: I'll be damned if Blister's description of "Fool's meth" isn't reminiscent of Naked Lunch.

name: missionofburma
text:
Can't believe I was the first to chubby this.

Achewood may be less literary than you thought. Tonight at Eleven.

name: cpnglxynchos
text: this just in, some take a while to get through the archives.

name: fmercury
text: Does Teodor's sweater look like half of an IU shirt to anyone else?

name: woodenteeth
text: The last two panels of this strip is what draws me back constantly to Achewood. Beautifully contrived stories that skip between absurdity and reality with hilarious precision.

name: heccibiggs
text:
This strip is hilarious, and educational.

I think Blister is one of my favourite characters now.

name: possums
text: I think Blister is one of the most underrated characters in Achewood.

name: afterward
text: Absolutely. It's a shame he doesn't show up any more.

name: xiaomimi
text:

name: direhaggis
text: B-Flat or A-Sharp??

name: unsentletter
text: I love the way the language goes in this one.

name: ryaldin
text:
Blister's permanently outstretched arms go a long way towards legitimizing his claim. He's not hatin on Nice Pete, he's laying a fact on Todd and Theodor;

GUY'S A DOUCHE

name: m3funkyb
text: a tickle harvest sounds like a relatively humane way to go

name: lowtrees
text: Blister may just be enjoying the freedom of expression that comes with being dead. Others have to show a little more tact around the psychotic murderer.

name: sp1derbaby
text: Only when "relatively" encompasses such inventive means such as the iron maiden or the "hang them upside down and use a giant saw" method.

name: dj_douche
text: That is some serious creative chops right there

text: aglets are what the plastic ends of shoelaces are called by the way
